mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A SET A.WK_REJ_RSON_CD = 'Y' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ A , TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ B WHERE A.IN_CHNL_DV_CD = '1' AND A.CST_SV_ASN_NO = B.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND A.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = B.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AND A.AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{asIstOjNo} )
